synopsis: Ye Song, a fan of fujoshi culture in the new era, one day, she travels across the space and time, and she becomes a Rani who is crazy about her husband! In her previous incarnation she died of extreme anger after seeing the Lord flirts with another woman, in this life, she will mess up in his palace! She goes to the brothels, read novels written for adults, fight with others. Can it become a bit more exciting! “ I love the King, I also kind of like the Lord, can I date with both of them?” The king said, “you can only be mine!"
